item.title: None of it comes with us.
item.description:
None of it comes with us.

There never was a better day. The day I realized I was nothing.

item.title: A Fresh Take On Coffee T-Shirts
item.description:
A Fresh Take On Coffee T-Shirts

The coffee shop has always been one of the great incubators for artist-types. It's a home base for creative nomads, where those not shackled to desk jobs go to sketch, write, or just ideate into leather-bound notepads, propped up only by a cup of coffee and, depending on your location and era, a pack of cigarettes.

item.title: Finlandia Caviar Shop and Restaurant, Helsinki, Finland
item.description:
Finlandia Caviar Shop and Restaurant, Helsinki, Finland

In designing a space that would be devoted primarily to the consumption of caviar, Helsinki-based designer Joanna Laajisto was careful to avoid clichés of outré parties, fur coats and blinding bling.

item.title: A Guide To Great Coffee In Kichijoji, Tokyo - Sprudge
item.description:
A Guide To Great Coffee In Kichijoji, Tokyo - Sprudge

Spring in Japan is marked by the cherry blossom, when pink clouds of the blooming flower paint on a canvas of clear blue sky. It's a time to celebrate the beautiful transience of life, which the locals often do at picnics in the park-known as -under a gentle rain of falling petals.

item.title: Mighty Audio's Portable Player
item.description:
Mighty Audio's Portable Player

There's now a tech solution for those who are tired of having their phone tag along on fitness activities but don't want to give up their perfectly tailored Spotify playlists. Allowing runners, bikers and others to detach from the physical (and mental) weight of smartphones is Mighty Audio, which launches on Kickstarter today.
